channel.title: Commodity Price Volatility on FinanClub

item.title: CHK
item.description: score:-29 Chances: Chesapeake Energy’s strategic decision to exit the Eagle Ford assets could streamline its focus on gas-rich formations. The sale of Eagle Ford assets to SilverBow Resources for $700 million adds to Chesapeake Energy’s proceeds from its strategic divestments. SilverBow Resources’ acquisition of Chesapeake Energy’s assets could enhance operational footprint and shareholder value.
